rdf:Description.dc:description: "Much of the original work contained in the report was prepared by Elston Dzus in 2001. This report has been reviewed, revised, and edited prior to publication. It is an ASRD/ACA working document that will be revised and updated periodically" -- t.p.
On cover: Alberta's species at risk program.
